# Read input
N = int(input())

# Calculate the number of 1000-yen bills required
num_1000_yen_bills = N // 1000

# Calculate the change
change = N % 1000

# Print the change
print(change)


n = int(input())

print(1000 - n % 1000)

# Read input
N = int(input())

# Calculate the number of 1000-yen bills required
num_1000_yen_bills = N // 1000;

# Calculate the change
change = N % 1000;

# Print the change
print(change);

n = int(input())
print(1000 - n % 1000 if n % 1000 != 0 else 0)


def main():
    # Read input
    N = int(input())

    # Calculate the number of 1000-yen bills required
    num_1000_yen_bills = N // 1000

    # Calculate the change
    change = N % 1000

    # Print the change
    print(change)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

n = int(input())
print(1000 - (n % 1000))

# Read input
N = int(input())

# Calculate the change
change = 1000 - N % 1000

# Print the change
print(change)

# Read input
N = int(input())

# Calculate the number of 1000-yen bills required
num_1000_yen_bills = N // 1000 # N // 1000 is the integer division operator

# Calculate the change
change = N % 1000

# Print the change
print(change)

n = int(input())
print(1000 - n % 1000)

# Read input
N = int(input())
# Calculate the number of 1000-yen bills required
num_1000_yen_bills = N // 1000
# Calculate the change
change = N % 1000
# Print the change
print(change)
